Name: Farrah Nixon
Description:
Farrah was beaten to death with a brick in an alley. The police found her lying face down and bleeding from the head.

> WEST PALM BEACH Suspect sought in beating in alley Police are looking for whoever was responsible for beating a [trans person] found wearing women's clothes in an alley in the 500 block of 30th Street. [Possible deadname] Nixon, 45, was taken to St. Mary's Medical Center, where [she] was listed in critical condition on Thursday, according to police. Officers found Nixon lying face down and bleeding from the head about 9 p.m. on Jan. 19.
>
> They also found items that would belong in a purse scattered on the ground but did not find a purse. A witness told police that a man beat Nixon with a brick before leaving through the alley
